name: Swist
description:
Navigate the deep recesses of space in this action-packed Reflex Adventure

Avoid the Red Ships by dragging your shipd.
...Watch Out for awesome pickups.
Keep your reflexes up.. You are going to need them
Because life has no Pause Button, neither does this

Inspired by the classic Sinuous
Swist is here!

-- 9 Brutal Warp Levels
--3 Initial PowerUps
--Unlock 2 Amazing Powers Up
--Intense Explosions
--Groovy Soundtrack

Are you ready to Swist??
